EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Last Chance / Sponsors 7-26-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance for SpringOne Platform 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Learn from the leaders
The SpringOne Platform 2016 schedule is live <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/2016-08-02]]>! Join Industry and Pivotal keynote speakers like CEO Rob Mee, Juergen Hoeller, Rossen Stoyanchev, Phil Webb, Stephane Nicoll, Josh Long, Adrian Cockcroft, Sam Ramji, James Watters, Onsi Fakhouri, Bridget Kromhout, Cornelia Davis, together with speakers from Comcast, Bloomberg, McKesson, Microsoft, Google, Citi, Accenture and many more.
Time is running out so register now <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>, and book your hotel at the Aria <[[https://aws.passkey.com/event/14801722/owner/1464789/home]]>.
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>
Check out the wide variety of sponsors that will be there to enrich your experience!
<[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]> Platinum
<[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]>
Aria Resort and Casino <[[https://www.aria.com/]]> 3730 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89158, United States [map <[[https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/ARIA+Resort+%26+Casino+Las+Vegas/@36.106659,-115.176909,16z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c8c42e1d156485:0x2ef3882f44b3056f?hl=en]]>] (702) 590-7111 <[[tel:17025907111]]>
Join the conversation at SpringOne Platform 2016!
We hope to see you there, The Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io]]> team
